p:
For the assessment of the use of CSMD1 gene as a diagnostic test for PD, receiver operating curve (ROC) analysis was performed ( Figure 3). Area under curve, p value, specificity, and sensitivity were computed for variables including rs1983474 and rs10503253, except for rs12681349. The area A
z under the curve of rs1983474 and rs10503253 is 0.585 and 0.548, and the p value is P < 0.001 and P=0.013, respectively. ROC showed that rs1983474 and rs10503253 have a low diagnostic ability in Parkinson's disease.
